title: Somewhere South of Suva
description: Adam Troy is contracted to search for a large diamond somewhere in the South Pacific. All he has to go on is a story he overheard in a bar some years ago of a bright red plane which came down in a lagoon on a remote island at the beginning of World War II.

title: The Archer's Ring
description: A seaplane carrying eight elderly Chinese merchants from Vila to Siagon sends out a mayday message and goes missing. Sometime later, the grand-daughter of one of the men charters the services of Adam and Oliver to search for her grand-father when a rare ring he was carrying is found on an island in the opposite direction from Vila to where the plane should have been traveling.

title: Walk Through the Night
description: Adam leads a somewhat shady group through the New Guinea jungle on a mission to rescue an injured man. In addition, they must hack their way through the almost impenetrable jungle while eluding a pursuing tribe of cannibals.
